Posts.Content: Hi start my treatment on 31st Jan chemo radio and herceptin I've already put on over 3 stone by not smoking gave up 16 months ago now size 18 so can't afford to put on any more weight exercising is no good for me as I have breathing problems but I walk as often as possible
Posts.Title: Do you put on weight while having chemo radio and herceptin

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply The waiting is terrible I had my operation on 5th December starting chemo 31st Jan but it was touch and go whether I could get it or not underlying problems  then it's on to radiotherapy 15 sessions finally the herceptin for a year hopefully that's the end of it for me hope all goes well for you
Posts.Title: oncotype dx
